name: Space Trip (Melanie Ramos)
description:
Space Trip is a game I made in 24hs for the FireTruck Game Jam (July 2017). The requirement was to make a game with just two inputs.

I used C# and Unity3D to make the game and 3DSMax to make the models of the spaceship and asteroids.

Controls:

  • Desktop: Left/Right arrow keys.
  • Android:  Move the phone from side to side (it uses the accelerometer of the phone)

I used some assets and music from Unity's Space Shooter tutorial (https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/13866)
